betterquesting:10.desc:8:
Well, I was right at being worried that me becoming more powerful would upset the tides of war, and possibly unleash a new threat.
The great lieutenant beasts of L'Borean seem to have entered a pact with the Old One residing there. A Fractallite power yet unclaimed, it seems, was made available to them. Hydrolisk and Dracyon ascended, and are now entering the battlefield.
If they were to enter Terra as they are, who knows what type of damage they may cause, I must face them now!
